name: Ecoema
description:
Ecoema (tomorrow morning in native-brazilian Tupi) is a game that makes you think about future generations, and what to leave for them, by looking back at the roots and ways of a now deserted land.

In the adventure, our character has to take care of and maintain a forest!

We must acquire and manage resources, as well as defend against killer worms!

Made during Global Game Jam 2023 at BelJogos site.

Team (virtual):

- Luiz Fernando Reinoso (Programmer)

- Arthur Braga (2d Artist)  

Credits:

"Moonlight Beach" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
